name: Slánú
description:
Nature controls the 3 Seeds of Time. She is the god of creation and watches us all. It’s believed that the three seeds possess the power to change the world with their roots that cross through the fibers of time, entangling them to their mother’s will.

The World is in chaos and Mother Nature has lost her power, yet there is still someone that can sense Nature's Call, the Druid. Help, through the mythical guidance of the Seeds, the Druid restore the natural order and peace in this World.
Bring color to this now gray world, oh almighty, help us spread happiness!

This game is being developed for the master's degree in Engineering in Digital Game Development for the duration of a year. This project is still in under development and we are releasing the first level of the game for QA testing purposes. So if you would be so kind to test our games and fill the quiz so that we have your feedback and we can improve on it. - Love, Dev. Team

Link for the QA.
